mapper.select:
select c.meetingboard_comment_no, c.meetingboard_comment_content,
c.meetingboard_comment_date, b.member_name, c.member_no, c.meeting_no,c.meetingboard_no
from meetingboard_comment c, member b
where c.member_no= b.member_no
and
c.meetingboard_no=#{meetingboardNo}
mapper.insert:
select meetingboard_comment_seq.nextval from dual
insert into meetingboard_comment (meetingboard_comment_no, meetingboard_comment_content, meetingboard_comment_date, meetingboard_no, meeting_no, member_no) values(#{meetingboardCommentNo}, #{meetingboardCommentContent}, sysdate, #{meetingboardNo}, #{meetingNo}, #{memberNo})
mapper.delete: delete from meetingboard_comment where member_no=#{memberNo} and meetingboard_comment_no=#{meetingboardCommentNo}
mapper.select: select count(meetingboard_comment_no) from meetingboard_comment where meetingboard_no=#{meetingboardNo}
